attributes.action: require the installation of sprinkler systems in all new schools and in any school that undergoes a major refurbishment
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is recognised amongst the fire-fighting profession that it is only a matter of time before there is a loss of life in a school because there are no fixed spinkler systems built into them.  Children are vulnerable and yet we offer them less protection where they gather to be educated than most adults get at work.  The installation of sprinklers in schools is long overdue.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "require the installation of sprinkler systems in all new schools and in any school that undergoes a major refurbishment."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15220.asp
